meanings.definition: Having a lively, cheerful, and self-confident manner.
meanings.sent1: She walked with a jaunty step, full of happiness and confidence.
meanings.sent2: He always wore a jaunty hat that added a touch of cheer to his outfit.
meanings.sent3: The jaunty little puppy wagged its tail happily as it chased its own shadow.
meanings.sent4: The jaunty tune of the music lifted everyone's spirits at the party.
meanings.sent5: Her jaunty laughter filled the room with joy and positivity.

meanings.sent1: The man looked quite jaunty in his well-fitted suit.
meanings.sent2: She chose a jaunty scarf to complete her fashionable ensemble.
meanings.sent3: The jaunty sunglasses gave him a cool and trendy look.
meanings.sent4: The jaunty bow tie added a touch of sophistication to his outfit.
meanings.sent5: Her jaunty hairstyle turned heads wherever she went.

meanings.sent1: His jaunty demeanor always brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: She greeted everyone with a jaunty wave and a big smile.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's jaunty jokes had the audience laughing non-stop.
meanings.sent4: The team captain's jaunty leadership inspired the players to do their best.
meanings.sent5: The singer performed with a jaunty attitude that captivated the audience.
